entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
